articles.author: Praveen Menon
articles.title: 'Reconciliation is dead': Indigenous Australians vow silence after referendum fails - Reuters
articles.description: Australian Indigenous leaders called on Sunday for a week of silence and reflection after a referendum to recognise First Peoples in the constitution was decisively rejected.
articles.content: SYDNEY, Oct 15 (Reuters) - Australian Indigenous leaders called on Sunday for a week of silence and reflection after a referendum to recognise First Peoples in the constitution was decisively rejecte… [+4146 chars]
